intro: Microstylis yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan microstylis, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Cyperaceae, commonly known as the sedge family. The plant is characterized by its slender, grass-like stems and small, clustered inflorescences. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as mountain forests and wetlands. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
